name: Thug io (opoly)
description:
Thug io is a board game about fake, WANNA-BE thugs. Commonly called criminals, hustlers, enforcers, 'Thug Life' is the opposite of someone having all he or she needs to succeed. 'Thug Life' is when you have nothing and succeed, when you have overcome all obstacles to reach your aim. Play a fictional opoly-style game based On 'The Thug Life'.

* AI (Artificial Intelligence) added. Players Can Play Against Their Device.


Optional Game Features:

* 2D/2.5D/3D play modes
* Customize your player cards
* Change player names
* Increase or decrease the amount of money played in the game
